archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.5.8c: c) running compliance, anti-money laundering or related programmes (involving the development of internal policies, procedures and controls, producing an ongoing employee training programme and following appropriate legislation)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
